author: alg
msg: IP clearance: #118466# This patch removes librsvg, libcroco, libgsf, gdk-pixbuf, glib, gettext,
and pango. Lost functionality is limited to the svg feature (see details in the task). Next step is to add svg again with an own interpreter which is already advancing.

author: smartini
msg: add RowEditorDemo Java class, to simplify run from sources in the right way (reading the resource file.).
Note its Demo pages haven't been updated to use this (but continue to use the bxml file) because it show how to give arguments to bxml files.
